description.ko: 백색광을 핵심 구성 요소로 분해하여 컬러 스펙트럼의 활기찬 에너지를 찬양합니다.
description.en: The deconstruction of white light into its core components, celebrating the vibrant energy of the color spectrum.

prompt: A high-precision cinematic macro shot of a complex geometric PRISM-2 hyper-cube. A sharp beam of intense white light explodes into a web of #FF0080 magenta, #00FF80 mint, and #8000FF violet spectral shards. Intense light dispersion and #FFFF00 yellow chromatic aberration create rainbow caustics that dance across a dark reflective surface. Hyper-realistic glass textures, raytracing, 8k resolution, capturing the chaotic beauty of pure energy refraction.
